messages.title: Attention
messages.body: Service is a bit slow atm.

messages.title: Letterboxd Rate Limiting
messages.body: We've recently had this issue but it now seem to be resolved. Please limit your scans to one a day to avoid further issues.

messages.title: Welcome to the News Feed
messages.body: We have added a news section to keep you updated on new features, patch notes, and known issues directly within the extension.

messages.title: New Feature: Friend Liker
messages.body: You can now automatically like reviews from your friends! Go to a film page on Letterboxd and look for the new button in the sidebar.
